name: oracle-jet-preact-ts-webpack-redux-styled-component
description: An Oracle JavaScript Extension Toolkit(JET) web app

scripts.preinstall: cd micro-frontend-shared; yarn; cd -; cd micro-frontend-app-1; yarn; cd -; cd micro-frontend-container; yarn; cd -;
scripts.start: (cd micro-frontend-app-1; yarn start; cd -; ) & ; (cd micro-frontend-container; yarn start; cd -) &
scripts.build: (cd micro-frontend-app-1; yarn build; cd -; ) & ; (cd micro-frontend-container; yarn build; cd -) &
